Testimonials.review: I am very grateful to the lawyers Lisia Saca and Rosa Garibello. They helped me very professionally with my son's naturalization certificate. I recommend this place 100%; it has a very pleasant atmosphere!
Testimonials.name: Ovidio De la campa

Testimonials.review: Very happy with the service received at the office of lawyer Lidia Saca. I appreciate the professional ethics I receive every time I visit the office! I recommend this place for any immigration or document notarization services!
Testimonials.name: Ana Maria Heredía Pupo

Testimonials.review: I visited the office of lawyers Lidia Saca and Rosa Garibello for my American Citizenship and the service was excellent! A very pleasant and trustworthy environment. Highly recommended 100%
Testimonials.name: Rudy Peña

Testimonials.review: Grateful to lawyers Lidia and Liliana who do a very professional job of Excellent quality in Notary Public in Cutler Bay Miami, always trying to help each client in a personalized way and adhering to Christian values.
Testimonials.name: Eddy Sotelo

Testimonials.review: Every time I visit this agency, I am amazed by the attention and the service is first class, EXCELLENT. Lidia and Rosa provide their clients with security, confidence, and respect in what they do. I recommend visiting the place.
Testimonials.name: Midiala Gomez

Testimonials.review: My experience was unique, exceptional, very satisfying. I recommend Lidia for any notarization and immigration services, a fast, clear service with excellent attention and a very pleasant atmosphere.
Testimonials.name: Diana Caridad Espinosa Melendez

Testimonials.review: I visited the office and received excellent attention and observed a good working environment. I recommend Dr. Lidia Saca for her excellent kindness and professional advice.
Testimonials.name: Victor Pajaro
